summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Bank for July 2017. It details deposits, withdrawals, and transfers, including significant outgoing transfers to various entities. The document highlights Epstein's financial activities during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder whose financial activities are detailed in this document.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield
persons.context: Steuart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Michael R. Ross
persons.context: Michael R. Ross is mentioned in connection with a transfer to his account along with Kimberly Ross.

persons.name: Kimberly Ross
persons.context: Kimberly Ross is mentioned in connection with a transfer to her account along with Michael Ross.

persons.name: Lee McKenzie
persons.context: Lee McKenzie is mentioned as a recipient of a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Steuart Oldfield is a representative of Deutsche Bank who assists Jeffrey Epstein with his account.
Michael R. Ross and Kimberly Ross are mentioned together as account holders receiving funds from Epstein.
Lee McKenzie is a consultant who received a funds transfer from Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Bank of America
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $2,373.80 was made to Bank of America.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Bank of America
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $3,000.00 was made to Bank of America.

events.title: Funds Transfer from Deposit
events.description: A funds transfer of $300,000.00 was credited to the account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Bank of China
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $5,722.20 was made to Bank of China.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Lee McKenzie Consultants
events.description: An outgoing transfer of $16,666.67 was made to Lee McKenzie Consultants, LLC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balances and transactions for July 2017.
Significant outgoing transfers include $300,000.00 to an unspecified deposit account and $16,666.67 to Lee McKenzie Consultants, LLC.
Multiple transactions involve outgoing transfers to Bank of America and Bank of China.
Steuart Oldfield is identified as a contact for account assistance.
The document contains redacted information regarding other transactions and account details.
